Summary._: Southbound [N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from Canal St to 36 St (BKLYN) because of signal problems at 36 St (BKLYN).

Description._: Southbound [N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from Canal St to 36 St (BKLYN) because of signal problems at 36 St (BKLYN).

LongDescription:
Southbound [N] trains are stopping along the [R] line from Canal St to 36 St (BKLYN) because of signal problems at 36 St (BKLYN).
Expect delays on [D] [N] and [R] train service.
Our crews are on scene making repairs and we hope to restore regular service soon. We will keep you posted.

Summary._: [F] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Avenue U.

Description._: [F] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Avenue U.

LongDescription:
[F] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Avenue U and West 8 St-NY Aquarium.
Our crews are on scene making repairs and we hope to resume regular service soon. We will keep you posted.
